name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in **Python**, **Flask**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**. Demonstrated proficiency in developing and maintaining **REST APIs**, and utilizing **GCP** for cloud-based solutions. Strong skills in **Git** for version control ensure collaborative code development. Proven ability to conduct thorough **Code Reviews** and deliver high-quality software through effective **Problem Solving** and a **Pragmatic Approach**. Committed to **Task Ownership**, ensuring timely delivery and impactful results. Excellent **Communication Skills** complement my technical capabilities, ensuring clear stakeholder engagement. Previously recognized for delivering scalable, user-focused applications in diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained REST APIs using **Flask** and **Python**, ensuring high performance and scalability, with a focus on achieving a 40% increase in data accuracy.
Implemented **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** for robust front-end applications, enhancing user engagement through improved UI/UX designs.
Utilized **GCP** for cloud services, optimizing application deployment and management while achieving 99.9% uptime.
Engaged in code review processes to maintain code quality and foster team collaboration, leading to a 30% reduction in bugs.
Employed **Git** for version control, ensuring efficient task ownership and seamless integration within the team.
Leveraged strong problem-solving skills to tackle complex issues in both front-end and back-end development, contributing to successful project outcomes.
Communicated effectively with cross-functional teams to enhance project visibility and ensure alignment with business goals.

Utilized **Python** and **Flask** to develop scalable backend services, improving performance by 30%.
Created **REST APIs** for seamless integration with frontend services, facilitating a smoother user experience, and enhancing system interactions.
Employed **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** in frontend development, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness, boosting user engagement metrics by 15%.
Integrated **GCP** cloud services for deployment, which enhanced system reliability and reduced downtime by 40%.
Led **Code Review** processes using **Git**, promoting best practices and enhancing code quality by 20%.
Practiced a **Pragmatic Approach** to problem solving, successfully addressing 95% of reported issues within a week.
Took ownership of tasks and projects, ensuring timely completion of deliverables with **effective communication** across cross-functional teams.

• Developed full-stack solutions utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python** (Flask) frameworks for efficient application workflow.
• Designed and implemented scalable **REST APIs** to enhance system integration and performance.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, applying strong **communication skills** to ensure alignment on project objectives.
• Conducted thorough **code reviews** to maintain high-quality standards, resulting in a **30%** reduction in post-deployment bugs.
• Leveraged **Git** for version control, managing **multiple branches** and contributing to streamlined development processes.
• Applied a **pragmatic approach** to problem-solving, enabling the swift resolution of technical challenges and deadlines adherence.
• Exhibited **task ownership** throughout the development lifecycle, ensuring responsibilities were met and deliverables were achieved on time.
• Deployed applications with experience in **GCP** and optimized cloud resources for reliability and performance, achieving **98% uptime**.
